name: Tally Hall Logo Disc Display
desc:
This is a display piece for the band [Tally Hall](https://www.tallyhall.com/).

Initially this design was just the logo with the segmented ring, but I wanted to do something closer to the [Red Vox piece](https://bigft.io/art/redvox), so I added the split tie.
short_desc: This is a display piece for the band Tally Hall.
